comprehensive_overview: libxsmm is a library for small matrix-matrix multiplications (SGEMM, DGEMM, CGEMM, ZGEMM) with runtime generated code and simplicity in mind. It is efficient on Intel architectures and offers optimized routines for various matrix multiplication tasks.
core_features: Optimized routines for SGEMM, DGEMM, CGEMM, ZGEMM
